body_html:
Depending on where you set it, it might be too late. It needs to be set the first time Cuda driver is loaded.

The safest thing to try is to set it in the script that launches your worker and ps.
body_text:
Depending on where you set it, it might be too late. It needs to be set the first time Cuda driver is loaded.
The safest thing to try is to set it in the script that launches your worker and ps.
body:
Depending on where you set it, it might be too late. It needs to be set the first time Cuda driver is loaded. 

The safest thing to try is to set it in the script that launches your worker and ps.
